title: Roast ribs of traditional beef with horseradish, crème fraîche and mustard sauce
description: Equipment and preparation: You will need a solid roasting tin.
ingredients: 3-rib joint, wing end or sirloin of beef on the bone (approx 2.7kg/6lb)
1 small onion, peeled and cut in half
salt and freshly milled black pepper
approx 1 litre/1 and three quarter pints vegetable stock, or water from the potatoes
